title: Fireside with the Underboss - "I'll Take a Nap, Then I'll Go Kill Him"
description: The true story of what happened to Alan Kaiser and exactly how Sammy was involved. A freak and very unfortunate accident while Sammy and his crew were looking for revenge.
itunes:author: Sammy "The Bull" Gravano
itunes:subtitle: The true story of what happened to Alan Kaiser and exactly how Sammy was involved. A freak and very unfortunate accident while Sammy and his crew were looking for revenge.
